channel.title: Mezzyscape or dungfest source 562?
channel.description: need advice which base should i use beginner to 562+ quitting codeusa and pi and delta for awhile

item.title: Mezzyscape or dungfest source 562?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Coder Eddie, post:9, topic:427404”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=530099.msg3870371#msg3870371 date=1325301160]

agreed no other base to use atm, or i cant find a food one i want 508+ corruption is growing fast and 614’s and stuff im watching it it would eb pointless to start a hyperion.

Shard Revolution, Hyperion, and Apollo are good.
[/quote]

with the people these days who would play the hyperion servers all got no players everyones about easy earning items and hd and all that shit.[/quote]

Players will always complain about that. Honestly, the smaller the community the better. Small communities are almost never bad, It’s when they grow that they become terrible. I’d rather have a small community than a large community.

Read full topic

item.title: Mezzyscape or dungfest source 562?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Coder Eddie:

man 317’s are getting harder and harder each day everyone using hybrid pvp, its just not the feeling im seeing new servers that are 508+ getting so much more players and my player count went back to 15 and low, im hoping to make a successful 562+.

I’m sure the revision isn’t causing your player-base to drop. You shouldn’t be using PI in the first place, and they aren’t hard at all. They’re actually as simple as it can get.

Read full topic
